subject: Re: Darkness Radio tonight
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
I listened to your interview, Bill.  Very nice... good job!  You 
covered all the bases and shared some very good information. Thanks!

- Mike

-----

All my Radio Shack Hack videos can be found at:
http://www.ufogeek.com

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psi_research" <vilhellm@...> wrote:
>
> The folks behind the event at The Stanley Hotel that Frank attended
> last month have invited me for a chat tonight to discuss ITC. I'll be
> on Darknessradio.com at 9 p.m. Pacific time. This message has been
> posted after speaking to Frank since for me, ITC includes the research
> that is covered by this group as well as the video ITC experiments
> I've done. -Bill
>
